Articles.Content:
Year 999999999 BC: Kerbin Formed.

Year 6784362 BC: First life formed in the oceans.

Year 6652450 BC: Plants and more advanced life forms appear on Kerbin

Year 2104 BC: First Kerbals develop.

Year 143 BC: Kerbals develop a love of the skies and worship the stars and the Mun as gods.

Year 1023 AD: Minmus is discovered, and the Mun is discovered not to be a god.

Year 1034 AD: Duna, Moho, and Eve are discovered.

Year 1065 AD: Jool is discovered, which was previously thought to be the Space Kraken, a creature from legends.

Year 1245 AD: All of Jool's moons are discovered.

Year 1965 AD: The first man made object is sent to space, Kerbnik. It mysteriously lost contact after a few days in orbit.

Year 2034 AD: Many space crafts have been sent to all planets and moons. Many lose contact similar to Kerbnik.

Year 2035 AD: The cause of the loss of contact of ships is found to be the Deep Space Kraken.

Year 2037 AD: A crew is sent to Bop to kill the Deep Space Kraken, along with 20 other Kerbals for back-up.

Year 2038 AD: Almost all of the Kerbals die in the war against the Deep Space Kraken, but eventually, in a deus ex machina, the Kraken is killed when a reinforcement ship crashes into the Kraken's mouth.

Year 3465: Kerbin is a very peaceful planet with advanced technology, and loves to travel in space.

Year 3468: A asteroid is spotted heading torwards Kerbin. KSP, the richest company in the world because of Kerbal's love for space travel, begins work secretly on Force Fields, cloning, gentic improvements, and a massive underground city to help the Kerbalnaughts and other KSP employees survive the asteroid, which was named Mortis, after the kerbal god of death.

Year 3470: KSP completes its research and puts a force field up around KSP. KSP starts choosing people to live in the underground city. Most other Kerbals evacuate to a distant solar system, never to return. KSP takes in the people who couldn't make it into the evacuation ship, out of kindness.

Year 3471: The bunker is closed down. Mortis hits kerbin, and creates a large crater, which can still be seen on Kerbin today. The dust and smoke blocked out the sky, killing off most plants. Kerbals were sent out to investigate, and came back with a virus and died quickly before spreading it. KSP sealed of again.

Year 1 SE/Year 3671: Kerbals sent out to investigate the world. No life remains, the virus killed off all life but the grass, which is immune to the virus. Suits are required to go out on the surface. A new era is founded, SE, or space era, because KSP is now focused on space travel, in memory of the old ages, and almost all info about the other planets and moons was lost. Despire researching gentic improvments for Kerbals, they never used them. They use the gentics on the Kerbalnaughts. The space age has begun.

Thanks for reading!

Edited June 21, 2013 by ninjakids
Added much more content
I had assumed this would go back to when Kerbals were evolving. Nice enough I guess.
Thanks for the idea! I will update it!

This is really good!

It explains everything about the game

Very nice!

Maybe add some more detail about spaceflight history (first mun landing, first space station, etc).
